name: Craig ALFORD, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 17th day of December, 2012, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
